Class Util

java.lang.Object
  ee.adit.util.Util

public class Util
extends java.lang.Object

Class providing static utility / helper methods.

Author:
Marko Kurm, Microlink Eesti AS, marko.kurm@microlink.ee, Jaak Lember, Interinx, jaak@interinx.com

public static java.lang.String createTemporaryFile(int itemIndex,
                                                   java.lang.String extension,
                                                   java.lang.String filesFolder)
Creates an empty temporary file to given folder.

Parameters:
itemIndex - Number of current file. Enables to give an index to all files related to same object etc.
extension - File extension to be given to the temporary file.
filesFolder - Folder path where the temporary file will be created.
Returns:
Full name of created file (absolute path)

splitOutTags

public static FileSplitResult splitOutTags(java.lang.String xmlFileName,
                                           java.lang.String tagLocalName,
                                           boolean noMainFile,
                                           boolean noSubFiles,
                                           boolean replaceMain,
                                           boolean removeSubFileRootTags)
Splits out file data from the main XML file. Used for reducing the XML size to be marshalled / unmarshalled.

Parameters:
xmlFileName - the XML file to be split
tagLocalName - the local name of the tags to be split out
noMainFile - specifies if a main file is used
noSubFiles - specifies if subfiles are created
replaceMain - specifies if the main file is replaced
removeSubFileRootTags - specifies if subfile root tags are removed after work is done
Returns:
the splitting result

joinSplitXML

public static void joinSplitXML(java.lang.String xmlFileName,
                                java.lang.String appendTags)
Joins a split XML.

Parameters:
xmlFileName - the main file
appendTags - specifies the tags where to append

r - Reader to be closed

getPersonalIdCodeWithoutCountryPrefix

public static java.lang.String getPersonalIdCodeWithoutCountryPrefix(java.lang.String personalIdCode)
Removes country prefix from personal ID code. For example: EE37001010001 will be changed to 37001010001

Parameters:
personalIdCode - Personal ID code with country prefix
Returns:
Personal ID code without country prefix

extractQueryName

public static XRoadQueryName extractQueryName(java.lang.String fullQueryName)
Extracts the query name from the X-Tee header. The query name must be in the format "[prefix].[queryName].v[versionNumber]"

Parameters:
fullQueryName - the full query name
Returns:
the resulting holder object
